lead_paragraph: As a kid, Bryce Alford would have his mother count down from five and he'd try to make a last-second shot in the family driveway.

headline.print_headline: UCLA Beats No. 7 Arizona 87-84, Ends 'Cats Win Streak at 8
headline.main: UCLA Beats No. 7 Arizona 87-84, Ends 'Cats Win Streak at 8
